title: The Pastfinders
brief_description: A drama set in the future, 1000 years from the twentieth century, when coins are found and the information fed into a computer it triggers its memory bank - what the coin was used for so long ago. This opening is a novel way to start a film about the dangers of cigarette smoking in the twentieth century. It shows the effects of smoking of human beings and the deaths caused by lung cancer.
